I recently purchased a lot of t206s and t207s and these cards are the ones I would like to sell.  If you have any questions email me.  Thnx.


T207 Frank Chance (HOF) HOF SGC 40 sold

T206 Joe Tinker (HOF) Old Mill back SGC 50 $225

T206 Mordecai Brown (HOF) SGC 50 sold

All prices include shipping with confirmation and full insurance.  Add 3% for paypal.
